item.title: Internet thinks Dark Brandon is back after Biden's Morning Joe interview. Watch
item.description: Joe Biden in Pennsylvania campaign Sunday joked that Dark Brandon will be back soon. Hours later, the internet announced the arrival of Dark Brandon after Biden's interview on Morning Joe. In the interview, a resolute president said he does not care what elites are saying about his candidacy. Anyone who thinks Biden can't run for presidency should first run against him, challenge him at the convention, Biden said.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: 'Hunter Biden thinks he's smarter than his father's aides, acting as gatekeeper'
item.description: Democrats who want Joe Biden to drop out of the presidential race, which is not a possibility anymore after the president's Monday morning letter, have two hurdles to cross. Many think it's overzealous Dr Jill Biden who is now holding campaigns on her own but convicted Hunter Biden is another gatekeeper who is keeping a close watch on Biden now -- especially after the debate fiasco.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Taliban reduces government salaries of Afghan women
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Rob Reiner says it's time to stop f***ing around, call for Biden to step down
item.description: 'When Harry met Sally' director Rob Reiner called for President Joe Biden stepping down the presidential race. He said it's time to stop f***ing around because if Donald Trump wins the election, America loses its democracy. "It’s time to stop f---ing around. If the Convicted Felon wins, we lose our Democracy. Joe Biden has effectively served US with honor, decency, and dignity. It’s time for Joe Biden to step down," Reiner posted on X.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Mass brawl on Ryanair flight forces pilot to make emergency landing. A family was asked to swap seat
item.description: ​A Ryanair flight last week had to be diverted when it was flying at 30,000 feet as a fight between two families became a mass brawl -- 30 minutes into the flight. Footage published by the Sun shows passengers screaming at each other on the Morocco to London flight. A witness to the shocking brawl said it all started with a passenger asking a woman to swap the seat so that he could sit with his wife and children.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Did Hawk Tuah girl turn down Playboy offer? Here's the truth
item.description: Hailey Welch said it is true that Playboy approached her through a friend to include her in some of their stuff but she rejected it. The viral Hawk Tuah girl in an Instagram Q&A said she is not doing OnlyFans and will never do as she's not comfortable with that thing.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Why this Black radio host lost her job after interviewing Joe Biden
item.description: In an interview with CNN’s Victor Blackwell on Saturday, she admitted that these questions were part of eight suggested by Biden aides ahead of the interview. “The questions were sent to me for approval. I approved them,” she said. This has intensified the controversy surrounding Biden’s abilities following his lackluster performance in the first presidential debate, hosted by CNN.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Civilians' military trial: SC directs AG of Pakistan to address families' concerns over meetings with prisoners
Over 1,300 flights cancelled across US as Hurricane Beryl intensifies
item.description: Hurricane Beryl wreaks havoc in the US, causing over 1300 flight cancellations and delays. United and Southwest airlines issue travel advisories as the storm intensifies. With 11 deaths in the Caribbean, Beryl becomes a Category 1 hurricane. Brace for impact as it threatens to escalate to Category 2 upon landfall.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Stranded aid trucks in Egypt deepen Gaza's humanitarian crisis
Russian official says US left arms treaty to build weapons to menace China
Texas hunkers down as Hurricane Beryl hits coast
US President Biden gets instruction ahead of events? Staffers guide him on 'how to enter and exit' venue
item.description: President Joe Biden receives detailed instruction cards with large print and venue photos, outlining his path to the podium, according to Axios. This has sparked debates about his fitness for office amid calls for him to withdraw from the race. Some Democrats and staffers have questioned whether these preparations conceal the president's limitations. Republicans have criticized Biden's stage movements to suggest mental unfit. Supporters argue such planning is standard for security and event complexities.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Russian missiles hit a children's hospital in the Ukrainian capital and kill at least 10 elsewhere
France in limbo after Macron gamble fails to break political deadlock
$1,000 for new parents? 'Baby bonus' initiative will pass if Baltimore voters approve
item.description: Baltimore residents may receive $1,000 under the "baby bonus" program, aimed at supporting new parents to combat childhood poverty from birth. Following a successful signature drive, the initiative will appear on November's ballot. Inspired by a Flint, Michigan model, it mirrors efforts in Europe and Asia to boost birth rates. Organizers argue for this initial step amid broader poverty solutions.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
